attributes.action: Ensure all health people of the United Kingdom can Donate Blood nomater their gender alignment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All citizens should be allowed to contribute to this vital Service. National demand for blood, and blood products is on the increase; by limiting   or restricting those  who can  not donate, due to their gender alinemnt or sexual practice surely contravenes their Human right to provide aid to those in need via the correct and appropriate agency.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
